mapper.update: UPDATE `pgp`.`member_info` SET member_nickname=#{member_nickname}, member_gender=#{member_gender}, member_phone=#{member_phone}, member_birth=#{member_birth}, member_photo=#{member_photo}, member_intro=#{member_intro} WHERE member_id =#{member_id};
mapper.select: select * from pgp.member_info as a inner join pgp.board as b on a.member_idx=b.member_idx inner join pgp.board_photo as c on b.board_idx=c.board_idx where a.member_id=#{member_id};
SELECT a.member_id,b.board_comment_contents,b.board_comment_regdate from pgp.member_info as a join pgp.board_comment as b where a.member_id=#{member_id};
select board_idx from pgp.scrap where member_idx=#{member_idx} and scrapFN_idx=#{scrapFN_idx};

select a.photo_name,b.board_title,b.board_contents,b.board_comment, b.board_like,b.board_scrap,b.board_regdate from pgp.board_photo as a join pgp.board as b on a.board_idx = b.board_idx where b.member_idx=#{member_idx} and b.board_idx>55;
